text:
Hi everyone! Excited to join the group.
My name is Or and I've been a developer for 15 years. Been using Ember for over 2 years now. As a contractor I push it where ever I go, and in my role as CTO at Epiphyte, a Fintech startup, you can be sure that it is the choice for our frontend applications.
hello there, <@U0BNR9FCY>. You been to any meetups yet?
A couple of years ago. Haven't had much time since :simple_smile:
fair enough. It can be tricky at times
<@U05485UQL>: planing on attending Ember Camp this month
I’ll be missing it, unfortunately. Will be on holiday overseas

Afternoon/evening all. My name is Guy (name jokes incoming) and have been working with ember on and off for a year or so. I am a UI Developer with an interest in JS and Ember has been my main introduction
Yea done a fair bit with Meteor, and currently dipping my toes into the Angular pond
Angular is due to my new company having legacy apps using it, but won’t be jumping camps any time soon :smile:
we have some Angular running here, but not by choice either
it has its place I think, but even in my limited exposure it doesn’t feel as nice to work with as Ember
